bs-bookshelf-ve-bookmetainspector-title: Nneɛma a ɛkura nsɛm bi a ɛfa nwoma ho a y'ɛnfa no sɛ nwoma no nsɛmfu.
bs-bookshelf-ve-bookmeta-attr-author-hel: Hyehyɛ onipako a ɔtwerɔɔ nwoma no
bs-bookshelf-tag-bookshelf-box-desc: Fa nwoma no ti no hyehyɛ krataafa a ɛnka nwoma no ho.Nnumre noara bɛ  hyehyɛ ne ho sɛ nea nsɛmfua no pono no teɛ.
bs-bookshelf-ve-bookshelf-attr-book-help: Kyerɛ nwoma korɔ a kratafa yi  wɔ no anaa sɛ ɛyɛ ne death
